page.title: 20Use of The Media,P.G.,Stev.
page.content: In a survey of{100}people on different media we found that six times as many people use the television for entertainment as the radio.The most popular radio listening is music,followed by the news.The most popular types of television programmes are comedy and films.Most people get their news from the television and from newspapers.All households in{Pin {Green}get the{free}newspapers:{The {Comet}and{The Express},but less than half buy the weekly{Stevenage Gazette. {The Sun}is the commonest daily paper (36% of people buying it).While one family in ten do not take a daily paper.{The Mail on Sunday}is the most popular Sunday paper (24% of people buying it)and one family in seven do not buy a Sunday paper.
